name: Arcanjo Mikhael
description:
Arcanjo Mikhael radiates from the vibrating band of crystal blue light strength, order, protection and structure, among many other virtues.
His name is actually both a statement and a question, in certain respects: "He who is like God" or "Who is like God?"
In it, we recognize our greatness and, at the same time, smallness. Our infinite potential and present imperfection, like swords to be forged and sharpened throughout Life.
He is the rectified Creator Word, who springs straight from the divine heart, who teaches us power and responsibility with our words and actions.
It is respect for yourself and others, the limits and healthy permissions for coexistence, internal and external. It is the light of alignment with the Will, which courageously carries out the journey of the inner warrior.

Year: 2020 | Technique: Drawing on 180g black paper. Using sign gel pen, posca and colored pencils.

This artwork is from a limited edition of 22 prints
Printed in UltraChrome HDx mineral pigment - Epson
420x594mm Hahnemühle PhotoRag Ultrasmooth 308g
Mikhael - Brazil - Minas Gerais 2021

1530x2104pixels | .jpg | 92dpi | 2.05MB
